description:
It is a huge apartment with lots of light. It has everything that is needed to live and cook. A grand piano is about to arrive, that's the reason why the leaving looks so naked on the big carpet. Meanwhile we use it for yoga.


Lugares de interés: Pratt Institute, Madiba, Brooklyn Kolache Co., Roman's, y Chez Oskar. Te va a encantar mi espacio por la luz y los techos altos. Mi alojamiento es bueno para parejas, aventureros, viajeros de negocios, y familias (con hijos).

You can walk to downtown Manhattan through Brooklyn bridge in just an hour.

You can use the whole house. 
Laundry and driers are on the basement.
There is a locked wardrove where we leave out personal stuff.

We will be available, but since we don't want to work as an agency, please read everything here before asking many things.

Quite

Classon station G train is one block away.
Reaching downtown Manhattan in 30 min. By walk is only 1 hour.
New York is for walking.
Also lots of buses which sometimes is better to move around Brooklyn.
name: Great sunny loft. Only 1h walk to Manhattan
